org.sakaiproject.portal.render.portlet.services.state

Class SimplePortletStateEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.portal.render.portlet.services.state.SimplePortletStateEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PortletStateEncoder

    public class SimplePortletStateEncoder
extends Object
implements PortletStateEncoder
    Simple implementation of the PortletStateEncoder. This implementation simply serializes the portlet state and encodes the bits in a url safe maner.
    Since:
    2.2.3
    Version:
    $Id: SimplePortletStateEncoder.java 18420 2006-11-26 03:32:14Z ddewolf@apache.org $
